div.p: was shown in Fig. 1. We can't show all maps because of space reasons. For the Al compound, there is a clear diffuse signal at 1/3HK0 and 2/3HK0. Ga compound shows a less intense diffuse signal at the same positions.

figure.head: Fig. 1 .
figure.figDesc: Fig. 1. Reciprocal space maps for Cu 2 GaBO 5 , Cu 2 AlBO 5 , Cu 2 MnBO 5 , and Cu 2 Ga 0.45 Mn 0.55 BO 5

div.p: This project is funded by the German Research Foundation (DFG) through the Collaborative Research Center SFB 1143 in Dresden (project C03) and is part of the PhD work of A. Kulbakov.
